I get to use my imagination and create new characters every day.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted.

i am headed to university of michigan in the fall.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do in your free time?
I love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard. I like to use my imagination and create new characters every day.
That sounds great! I wish I could write stories. I'm not good at writing at all.
You don't have to be good at writing to enjoy it! It's a great way to express yourself and let your imagination run wild.
You're right, I should give it a try. I love to read, so maybe writing will come naturally to me.
I'm sure it will! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially like mystery and suspense novels. I also like historical fiction.
I love historical fiction too! It's so interesting to learn about different time periods and cultures.
Me too! I'm also really interested in mythology and folklore.
Me too! I love learning about different cultures and their beliefs.
It's so fascinating to see how people's beliefs have changed over time.
I know, right? It's amazing how much history can teach us about the human condition.
It really is. I'm so glad we had this conversation. It was really nice to meet you.
Me too! It was nice to meet you too. I hope we can talk again soon.
